Name: Snow Fortress
About the game: SNOWBALL FIGHT! Relive your childhood by building the perfect snow fort and protecting it from getting trashed by an army of angry snowmen! Unlock tools to protect your fort and deliver a flurry of snowballs at your opponents! Build your defenses and destroy your opponentâ€™s fort in 20 unique levels Throw snowballs or use your slingshot to do some real damage Build and maintain a fort while protecting it against waves of attacking snowmen in Survival Mode Play cooperatively or competitively in online multiplayer Unlock shields and repair tools to protect yourself and your fort Compete in global leaderboards Design a fortress from a bird's eye view and garrison its towers in Fortress Mode Feel snowball impacts on your face, hands, and body with bHaptics devices Available on Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, and Windows Mixed Reality headsets with motion controllers. Don't have VR at home? Snow Fortress can be found at many SpringboardVR, VR Junkies, Synthesis VR, Ctrl V, MontVR arcades around the world - with more locations coming soon! (Hint: Brazil, Finland, and South Korea are about to get frosty.)
